events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position. The resume shows relevant experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The application has been categorized under Engineering as the candidate fits the need for a developer skilled in cloud infrastructure and backend systems.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to handle this candidate's recruitment process for the software engineer role.
Initial screening call was completed successfully. The candidate demonstrated strong fundamental knowledge of software development and showed enthusiasm for the position.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback, confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled next week.
A technical interview has been scheduled for May 9th to assess coding skills and system design expertise of the software engineer candidate.
